content:
本件保存七年
c2-62-2353
July 31, 2
MEMORANDUM
To : Taiwan Public Works Bureau From : C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang Subject : Excess Equipment
Original signed by
Reference is made to CUSA letter to US AID/C, 02-62-2181, dated July 14, 1962 concerning some locally available parts and other miscellaneous itens, copy of which has been sent to you direct.
We understand that you have already picked up all the available items and are proceeding on distribution among THB/PWB/KLHB/KsHB/SDC through negotiation as we have suggested.
We are in receipt of a letter from Mr. H. T. Potter, Supply Advisor of US AID/C, asking a detailed list of distribution of the said items be furnished. Therefore, please submit the distribution list soonest possible for our records and also for transmit tal to Mr. Potter for his referencs.
cc: Mr. H. T. Potter, US AID/C 2D CS/psh
E-16. 13. 2
51. 3. 100× 200
國史馆 Academia Historica
0
65

paragraphs.content: To : Taiwan Public Works Bureau From : C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang Subject : Excess Equipment
Reference is made to CUSA letter to US AID/C, 02-62-2181, dated July 14, 1962 concerning some locally available parts and other miscellaneous itens, copy of which has been sent to you direct.
We understand that you have already picked up all the available items and are proceeding on distribution among THB/PWB/KLHB/KsHB/SDC through negotiation as we have suggested.

We are in receipt of a letter from Mr. H. T. Potter, Supply Advisor of US AID/C, asking a detailed list of distribution of the said items be furnished. Therefore, please submit the distribution list soonest possible for our records and also for transmit tal to Mr. Potter for his referencs.
